column1: #Text=Zhu Li says : " Do you think this plan will actually work , sir ? "
#Text=Varrick says : " I know I can stop the mecha suits with an electromagnetic pulse , so it stands to reason that I can stop a giant mecha suit with a giant electromagnetic pulse .
#Text=But lately , I 've been thinking about you .
#Text=I know we might not make it out of this mess and I feel like there are some things I should tell you .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I remember when I was a boy , I had an ostrich horse .
#Text=Did I ever tell you that , Zhu Li ?
#Text=This was before the circus people took me away .
#Text=Anyway , I loved old Mrs. Beaks , but I took her for granted .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " You 'll have to finish your story later .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I 'm afraid there are no more things to do .
#Text=It shut down the mecha suits , but our power source is fine .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Locate the source of the pulse .
#Text=Third and fourth mech platoons , move in and continue the sweep .
